meanings.definition: A person with a face covered in feces.
meanings.sent1: The baby had a shitface after playing in the mud.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but laugh when I saw his shitface covered in chocolate.
meanings.sent3: The dog gave me a playful look with a pretend shitface.
meanings.sent4: Her makeup was so poorly done, she looked like a shitface clown.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie had a scene with a terrifying shitface creature.

meanings.definition: A derogatory term for someone acting foolishly or annoyingly.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a shitface and listen to what I'm saying.
meanings.sent2: He always acts like a shitface when he's had too much to drink.
meanings.sent3: The class clown made a joke and called himself a silly shitface.
meanings.sent4: Her behavior at the party was a real shitface move.
meanings.sent5: His constant interruptions made him the biggest shitface in the room.
